full_sentence: Dude, violence against men isn't even considered serious. If a woman so much as hints that a man abused her in even an inconsequential way she gets all the platforms to inform everyone about her oppression. Why do you think there's a term toxic masculinity and no equivalent toxic femininity? Because whatever issue, or whinge a woman has is treated with absolute credulity. The opposite is the case for men.
Something tells me this woman doesnt have a stable and successful life.
